participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and hardworking, Emily is passionate about animals and enjoys being outdoors.
participant_1.background: i like to ride horses. i help tend the fields. i like to listen to rock music while working. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, Jake has a deep love for music and enjoys sharing his passion with others.
participant_2.background: i grew up in the industry. my favorite band is rascal flats. i'm a country music singer. i started playing guitar when i was three.
